stories.text:
People who are competitive, what drives you really? Do you feel jealous when you see other people getting successful.

I have never been a competitive person and always cooperated with other people even at the expense of my own success, that's what I want to change that. Any suggestions?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why are you a competitive person?

stories.text:
We have a developer tool (it's a subset of agile PM tools) and have 600000+ total users with 180-225K monthly user sessions, It is offered as a free tool and few months ago we launched Pro/Enterprise plans as well, We still offer 90-95% features as free, Now we generate some revenue not much but we are able to pay all the costs and will optimise our pricing model in next 3-6 months.

We get some interest in the tool from investors and one is offering us a possibility of 1.5-2.5 M USD seed round. Is it wise to take the VC money or should we continue to bootstarp. We do not have a lot of expenses, 4 co-founders (3 developers, 1 marketing) all working part time on this tool along with our day jobs. All the development is done by ourselves.

With VC money we can leave our jobs and focus full time and hire few sales people, but we can achieve the same in 1 a year if we go little hard on free to paid conversion. Also we are based in Scandinavia, and the VC is in USA, should we takes money from local VC in Europe or it does not matter.

What are benefits of taking VC money and what are downsides, can some of you really tell us your personal experiences, it will help us to make the decision.

Thanks in advance
stories.title: Bootstrap or take seed round of 1.5M-2.5M
A Rubyist's Walk Along the C-Side Part 6-Classes and Object Oriented Programming
HTTP server in Ruby 3 – Fibers and Ractors

stories.text:
I am looking for a simple image database to manage around 10k images and its (custom) metadata. Most of the digital asset management solutions are super complicated, offer workflows, are usually quite expensive, and are not very intuitive.

Any recommendations what I could use. (open source welcome, but SaaS also fine). Thanks a lot!
stories.title: Ask HN: Looking for a simple Image Database (no overkill DAM)
Why does NBC make it so difficult to watch the Olympics?
Humane software and the role of developer advocacy
Project Pangea: Helping Underserved Communities Expand Access to the Internet
